The line of demarkation between such a class and the world will be too plain to be mistaken. The influence of believers would be tenfold greater if men 
                                                                           350
and women who accept the truth, who have been formerly careless and slack in their habits, would be so elevated and sanctified through the truth as to observe habits of neatness, order, and good taste in their dress. Our God is a God of order, and He is not in any degree pleased with distraction, with filthiness, or with sin.
